title: 153: Organic Olivia Chats Herbs & Natural Remedies
itunes:title: 153: Organic Olivia Chats Herbs & Natural Remedies
description:
The Broads are joined by Olivia Amitrano aka Organic Olivia who begins the episode by sharing how she has been doing the past few months - she shares with us about how both her parents (and herself) got COVID-19 and how she advocated for them. Then they discuss what and herbalist is and how her own personal experiences led her to becoming one. They also chat about elimination diets, the HPA axis, the importance of doing your research and advocating for yourself, and much more. 
OLIVIA AMITRANO:
Instagram: @organic_olivia 
Her line of herbal formulas - tinctures, capsules,”juices”, and syrups: http://www.organicolivia.com/shop
“What’s The Juice” Podcast: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/whats-the-juice/id1493579571
INSTAGRAM:
Chatty Broads: @chattybroads
Bekah: @bekah
Jess: @thebaddmom
